abstract: A global crackdown on bank oversight could undermine a fragile economic recovery if governments move too fast and fail to cooperate, international bankers warned at a conference on Sunday.
snippet: A global crackdown on bank oversight could undermine a fragile economic recovery if governments move too fast and fail to cooperate, international bankers warned at a conference on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: A global crackdown on bank oversight could undermine a fragile economic recovery if governments move too fast and fail to cooperate, international bankers warned at a conference on Sunday.

headline.main: Bankers Say Regulatory Crackdown Must Move Slowly

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
